name: paymentsresellersubscription_partners_subscriptions_create
description: Used by partners to create a subscription for their customers. The created subscription is associated with the end user inferred from the end user credentials. This API must be authorized by the end user using OAuth.

parent.description: Required. The parent resource name, which is the identifier of the partner. It will have the format of "partners/{partner_id}".

subscriptionId.description: Required. Identifies the subscription resource on the Partner side. The value is restricted to 63 ASCII characters at the maximum. If a subscription was previously created with the same subscription_id, we will directly return that one.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

GoogleCloudPaymentsResellerSubscriptionV.description: A subscription serves as a central billing entity between an external partner and Google. The underlying Google services rely on the subscription state to grant or revoke the user's service entitlement. It's important to note that the subscription state may not always perfectly align with the user's service entitlement. For example, some Google services may continue providing access to the user until the current billing cycle ends, even if the subscription has been immediately canceled. However, other services may not do the same. To fully understand the specific details, please consult the relevant contract or product policy.

createTime.description: Output only. System generated timestamp when the subscription is created. UTC timezone.

cycleEndTime.description: Output only. The time at which the subscription is expected to be extended, in ISO 8061 format. UTC timezone. For example: "2019-08-31T17:28:54.564Z"

endUserEntitled.description: Output only. Indicates if the subscription is entitled to the end user.

freeTrialEndTime.description: Output only. End of the free trial period, in ISO 8061 format. For example, "2019-08-31T17:28:54.564Z". It will be set the same as createTime if no free trial promotion is specified.

lineItems.description: Required. The line items of the subscription.

name.description: Identifier. Resource name of the subscription. It will have the format of "partners/{partner_id}/subscriptions/{subscription_id}". This is available for authorizeAddon, but otherwise is response only.

partnerUserToken.description: Required. Identifier of the end-user in partner’s system. The value is restricted to 63 ASCII characters at the maximum.

processingState.description: Output only. Describes the processing state of the subscription. See more details at [the lifecycle of a subscription](/payments/reseller/subscription/reference/index/Receive.Notifications#payments-subscription-lifecycle).

products.description: Optional. Deprecated: consider using `line_items` as the input. Required. Resource name that identifies the purchased products. The format will be 'partners/{partner_id}/products/{product_id}'.

promotionSpecs.description: Optional. Subscription-level promotions. Only free trial is supported on this level. It determines the first renewal time of the subscription to be the end of the free trial period. Specify the promotion resource name only when used as input.

promotions.description: Optional. Deprecated: consider using the top-level `promotion_specs` as the input. Optional. Resource name that identifies one or more promotions that can be applied on the product. A typical promotion for a subscription is Free trial. The format will be 'partners/{partner_id}/promotions/{promotion_id}'.

redirectUri.description: Output only. The place where partners should redirect the end-user to after creation. This field might also be populated when creation failed. However, Partners should always prepare a default URL to redirect the user in case this field is empty.

renewalTime.description: Output only. The time at which the subscription is expected to be renewed by Google - a new charge will be incurred and the service entitlement will be renewed. A non-immediate cancellation will take place at this time too, before which, the service entitlement for the end user will remain valid. UTC timezone in ISO 8061 format. For example: "2019-08-31T17:28:54.564Z"

state.description: Output only. Describes the state of the subscription. See more details at [the lifecycle of a subscription](/payments/reseller/subscription/reference/index/Receive.Notifications#payments-subscription-lifecycle).

updateTime.description: Output only. System generated timestamp when the subscription is most recently updated. UTC timezone.

GoogleCloudPaymentsResellerSubscriptionV.description: Describes the details of a cancelled or cancelling subscription.

reason.description: Output only. The reason of the cancellation.

GoogleCloudPaymentsResellerSubscriptionV.description: Individual line item definition of a subscription.

description.description: Output only. Description of this line item.

lineItemFreeTrialEndTime.description: Output only. The free trial end time will be populated after the line item is successfully processed. End time of the line item free trial period, in ISO 8061 format. For example, "2019-08-31T17:28:54.564Z". It will be set the same as createTime if no free trial promotion is specified.

lineItemIndex.description: Output only. A unique index of the subscription line item.

lineItemPromotionSpecs.description: Optional. The promotions applied on the line item. It can be: - a free trial promotion, which overrides the subscription-level free trial promotion. - an introductory pricing promotion. When used as input in Create or Provision API, specify its resource name only.

product.description: Required. Product resource name that identifies one the line item The format is 'partners/{partner_id}/products/{product_id}'.

recurrenceType.description: Output only. The recurrence type of the line item.

state.description: Output only. The state of the line item.

GoogleCloudPaymentsResellerSubscriptionV.description: Describes the amount unit including the currency code.

amountMicros.description: Required. Amount in micros (1_000_000 micros = 1 currency unit)

currencyCode.description: Required. Currency codes in accordance with [ISO-4217 Currency Codes] (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217). For example, USD.

SubscriptionLineItemBundleDetails.description: The bundle details for a line item corresponding to a hard bundle.

bundleElementDetails.description: Output only. The details for each element in the hard bundle.

GoogleCloudPaymentsResellerSubscriptionV.description: The details for an element in the hard bundle.

product.description: Output only. Product resource name that identifies the bundle element. The format is 'partners/{partner_id}/products/{product_id}'.

userAccountLinkedTime.description: Output only. The time when this product is linked to an end user.

GoogleCloudPaymentsResellerSubscriptionV.description: Details for a subscriptiin line item with finite billing cycles.

billingCycleCountLimit.description: Required. The number of a subscription line item billing cycles after which billing will stop automatically.

GoogleCloudPaymentsResellerSubscriptionV.description: Describes the spec for one promotion.

promotion.description: Required. Promotion resource name that identifies a promotion. The format is 'partners/{partner_id}/promotions/{promotion_id}'.

type.description: Output only. The type of the promotion for the spec.

GoogleCloudPaymentsResellerSubscriptionV.description: Describes the length of a period of a time.

count.description: number of duration units to be included.

unit.description: The unit used for the duration

GoogleCloudPaymentsResellerSubscriptionV.description: The details of a introductory pricing promotion.

introductoryPricingSpecs.description: Output only. Specifies the introductory pricing periods.

GoogleCloudPaymentsResellerSubscriptionV.description: The duration of an introductory pricing promotion.

discountRatioMicros.description: Output only. The discount percentage in micros. For example, 50,000 represents 5%.

recurrenceCount.description: Output only. Output Only. The duration of an introductory offer in billing cycles.

regionCode.description: Output only. 2-letter ISO region code where the product is available in. Ex. "US".

GoogleCloudPaymentsResellerSubscriptionV.description: Details for a ONE_TIME recurrence line item.
A description of what time period or moment in time the product or service is being delivered over.

endTime.description: Optional. The end time of the service period. Time is exclusive.

startTime.description: Required. The start time of the service period. Time is inclusive.

GoogleCloudPaymentsResellerSubscriptionV.description: Payload specific to Google One products.

campaigns.description: Campaign attributed to sales of this subscription.

offering.description: The type of offering the subscription was sold by the partner. e.g. VAS.

salesChannel.description: The type of sales channel through which the subscription was sold.

storeId.description: The identifier for the partner store where the subscription was sold.

accessEndTime.description: Output only. The access expiration time for this line item.

partnerEligibilityIds.description: The list of eligibility_ids which are applicable for the line item.

partnerPlanType.description: Optional. Specifies the plan type offered to the end user by the partner.

GoogleCloudPaymentsResellerSubscriptionV.description: Describes a location of an end user.

postalCode.description: The postal code this location refers to. Ex. "94043"

regionCode.description: 2-letter ISO region code for current content region. Ex. “US” Please refers to: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1

GoogleCloudPaymentsResellerSubscriptionV.description: Details about the previous subscription that this new subscription upgrades/downgrades from.

billingCycleSpec.description: Required. Specifies the billing cycle spec for the new upgraded/downgraded subscription.

previousSubscriptionId.description: Required. The previous subscription id to be replaced. This is not the full resource name, use the subscription_id segment only.

$block: A subscription serves as a central billing entity between an external partner and Google. The underlying Google services rely on the subscription state to grant or revoke the user's service entitlement. It's important to note that the subscription state may not always perfectly align with the user's service entitlement. For example, some Google services may continue providing access to the user until the current billing cycle ends, even if the subscription has been immediately canceled. However, other services may not do the same. To fully understand the specific details, please consult the relevant contract or product policy.

$ul: **cancellationDetails**: Describes the details of a cancelled or cancelling subscription.
**reason**: Output only. The reason of the cancellation.
**createTime**: Output only. System generated timestamp when the subscription is created. UTC timezone.
**cycleEndTime**: Output only. The time at which the subscription is expected to be extended, in ISO 8061 format. UTC timezone. For example: "2019-08-31T17:28:54.564Z"
**endUserEntitled**: Output only. Indicates if the subscription is entitled to the end user.

**freeTrialEndTime**: Output only. End of the free trial period, in ISO 8061 format. For example, "2019-08-31T17:28:54.564Z". It will be set the same as createTime if no free trial promotion is specified.
**lineItems**: Required. The line items of the subscription.

**name**: Identifier. Resource name of the subscription. It will have the format of "partners/{partner_id}/subscriptions/{subscription_id}". This is available for authorizeAddon, but otherwise is response only.
**partnerUserToken**: Required. Identifier of the end-user in partner’s system. The value is restricted to 63 ASCII characters at the maximum.

**processingState**: Output only. Describes the processing state of the subscription. See more details at [the lifecycle of a subscription](/payments/reseller/subscription/reference/index/Receive.Notifications#payments-subscription-lifecycle).

**products**: Optional. Deprecated: consider using `line_items` as the input. Required. Resource name that identifies the purchased products. The format will be 'partners/{partner_id}/products/{product_id}'.

**promotionSpecs**: Optional. Subscription-level promotions. Only free trial is supported on this level. It determines the first renewal time of the subscription to be the end of the free trial period. Specify the promotion resource name only when used as input.

**promotions**: Optional. Deprecated: consider using the top-level `promotion_specs` as the input. Optional. Resource name that identifies one or more promotions that can be applied on the product. A typical promotion for a subscription is Free trial. The format will be 'partners/{partner_id}/promotions/{promotion_id}'.

**redirectUri**: Output only. The place where partners should redirect the end-user to after creation. This field might also be populated when creation failed. However, Partners should always prepare a default URL to redirect the user in case this field is empty.

**renewalTime**: Output only. The time at which the subscription is expected to be renewed by Google - a new charge will be incurred and the service entitlement will be renewed. A non-immediate cancellation will take place at this time too, before which, the service entitlement for the end user will remain valid. UTC timezone in ISO 8061 format. For example: "2019-08-31T17:28:54.564Z"
**serviceLocation**: Describes a location of an end user.
**postalCode**: The postal code this location refers to. Ex. "94043"
**regionCode**: 2-letter ISO region code for current content region. Ex. “US” Please refers to: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1

**state**: Output only. Describes the state of the subscription. See more details at [the lifecycle of a subscription](/payments/reseller/subscription/reference/index/Receive.Notifications#payments-subscription-lifecycle).
**updateTime**: Output only. System generated timestamp when the subscription is most recently updated. UTC timezone.
**upgradeDowngradeDetails**: Details about the previous subscription that this new subscription upgrades/downgrades from.
**billingCycleSpec**: Required. Specifies the billing cycle spec for the new upgraded/downgraded subscription.
**previousSubscriptionId**: Required. The previous subscription id to be replaced. This is not the full resource name, use the subscription_id segment only.
